thread.title: Dana Library Begins Loans of Apple iPad 2s to Students (Rutgers University, Newark)
thread.title_full: Dana Library Begins Loans of Apple iPad 2s to Students (Rutgers University, Newark) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Dana Library Begins Loans of Apple iPad 2s to Students (Rutgers University, Newark)
text: ( Source : Rutgers University , Newark ) The John Cotton Dana Library has begun making short-term loans of 15 Apple iPad 2s to students at Rutgers University-Newark , effective Sept. 28. The 16 GB iPad 2s, the second generation of the device,
